message: I appreciate the offer Alice, but how about we give you a bit of a signing bonus this round, and I take a bit more?
I'll take a bit more this time, Bob. Think about it!
Okay Alice, let's try to find a middle ground. This offer is better for you than the last round!
Come on, Bob! This is a good deal!
Alice, time is running out! This is a fair offer considering the inflation working against you.
Bob, you need to meet me halfway!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer before the inflation eats your share even more!
